00037 #include "egs_parallel_beam.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_ParallelBeam::EGS_ParallelBeam(EGS_Input *input,
00041     EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSimpleSource(input,f), shape(0), uo(0,0,1) {
00042     vector<EGS_Float> dir;
00043     if( !input->getInput("direction",dir) ) {
00044         if( dir.size() != 3 ) egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: you must input"
00045              " 3 numbers in the 'direction' input\n"
00046              "  but I got %d => ignoring the input\n",dir.size());
00047         else {
00048             uo.x = dir[0]; uo.y = dir[1]; uo.z = dir[2];
00049             EGS_Float norm = uo.length();
00050             if( norm < 1e-6 ) {
00051                 egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: the length of the direction"
00052                      " vector can not be zero => ignoring your input\n");
00053                 uo.x = 0; uo.y = 0; uo.z = 1;
00054             } else uo *= (1./norm);
00055         }
00056     }
00057     EGS_Input *ishape = input->takeInputItem("shape");
00058     if( ishape ) {
00059         //egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: trying to construct the shape\n");
00060         shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape); delete ishape;
00061     }
00062     if( !shape ) {
00063         string sname; int err = input->getInput("shape name",sname);
00064         if( err )
00065             egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: missing/wrong inline shape "
00066               "definition and missing wrong 'shape name' input\n");
00067         else {
00068             shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(sname);
00069             if( !shape ) egsWarning("EGS_ParallelBeam: a shape named %s"
00070                     " does not exist\n");
00071         }
00072     }
00073     setUp();
00074 }
00075 
00076 void EGS_ParallelBeam::setUp() {
00077     otype = "EGS_ParallelBeam";
00078     if( !isValid() ) description = "Invalid parallel beam";
00079     else {
00080         description = "Parallel beam from a shape of type ";
00081         description += shape->getObjectType();
00082         description += " with ";
00083         description += s->getType();
00084         if( q == -1 ) description += ", electrons";
00085         else if( q == 0 ) description += ", photons";
00086         else if( q == 1 ) description += ", positrons";
00087         else description += ", unknown particle type";
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 extern "C" {
00092 
00093 EGS_PARALLEL_BEAM_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource* createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00094         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00095     return createSourceTemplate<EGS_ParallelBeam>(input,f,"parallel beam");
00096 }
